department: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
short_summary: Inspection and repair of building mechanical systems at Bathurst Armory in Bathurst, New Brunswick
description: Provide needed labor, material, tool and equipment for the maintenance inspection and repairs of building mechanical systems
full_summary:
## Government Tender Announcement
### Project Title (English/French)
**Inspection and Repair of Building Mechanical Systems - Bathurst Armory**
**Inspection et réparation des systèmes mécaniques de bâtiments - manège militaire de Bathurst**

#### Request for Proposal
The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) on behalf of the Department of National Defence will soon be seeking a contractor to perform inspection and repair services for the building mechanical systems at the Bathurst Armory in Bathurst, New Brunswick.

**Key Details:**
* **Solicitation Number:** WS4266752438
* **Tender Closing Date:** November 9th, 2023, at 14:00:00
* **Request for Proposal Submission:** For more information on how to submit a proposal, please visit [Downloads not available; check the original data source ariba](https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/17797705?extsite=MTc3OTc3MDVfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==).
* **Project Location:** Bathurst Armory, Bathurst, New Brunswick
* **Services Required:** Furnishing labor, materials, tools, and equipment to complete major maintenance inspection and repairs for building mechanical systems
* **Competitive Bid:** Bidding will be open to all qualified contractors.
* **Evaluation Criteria:** Price

**Important Dates:**
* Tender closing date: พฤศจิกายน 9 น. 2023(enum) 1400:00 ect
* Attachment information-[bitsetinformationassociation]= DP TransAnth reductions__
